storyInfo: In the wake of the bombing, Dublinn forces, under the command of their 'Leader', are unbridled in their counterattack. The casualties among the meeting's attendees are horrific.

attributes.content: Ugh, ahem...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Leader, are you alright?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'm okay. But you, we're lucky you didn't jump on it this time.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You reacted faster than me. At least everyone in this bit of the hall's basically fine, thanks to your shield.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I couldn't protect everyone.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The smoke's everywhere it'll go. Looks to me like the Colonel only took light harm, and they're retreatin' out another door.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The Bard...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Oh... He was stood too close to the bomb.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What a pity... it's not everyone who can step forth for others at bladepoint. He was a poet, but he had the courage to match an excellent soldier.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I wish so badly he could've died with meaning.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: While the enemy's still outside, Bagpipe, let's evacuate the survivors.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Bagpipe...?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Bagpipe stares blankly out of the window.
In that single moment, it is as if the sound of battle vanishes.
A tremendous energy bursts from the depths of the night.
Without a flicker of a flare, from the statue to the city hall, all living beings are instantly, silently snapped to ash.
And immediately after, an army seeps out from the night and the ashes, without a sound.
I've never, ever seen... fire like this before.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The head Caster, who is she?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Bagpipe, move away, quick!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You're too close to the window. Given the energy just now, the next attack could blow straight through the walling.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Yes, Leader.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'm just...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Help me... hurry, help me...
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: My leg... argh, ow!
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: Focus on rescue. Pull back for now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Who was that? Are there still any Victorian soldiers alive?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: It's the enemy all over!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: By the speed of this march, the spectre force infiltrated this city long ago.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: District Eleven to Seventeen have been occupied far too quick... Can't be... Is this the reason the Colonel went to search those blocks?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: We need to withdraw south of District Ten. The troops and the spectre force are doing battle there right now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: D—Don't go off to battle, ta... take me back to somewhere I can hide in safety first... I can't let the heads find I'm still alive...
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: Take you back? With all of this goin' on right now, you ought to be taken straight to prison!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Lighter... wurgh... ow...
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: I... I'll pay you... I can even gift you a city block... so long as you...
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: Leader, can I use my own ways to shut him up?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: We'll ask a few things more while he's still awake.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Who was that heading the Casters just now?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: ...That's... The Leader...
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: The spectre force's leader?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What... who is she?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: Aren't you compatriots? You had the absolute gall to bring people into your house while knowin' nothin'?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: She's... the Duke's guest...
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: Duke...? Which one?!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I can't...
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: Urgh—
attributes.name: Wildly Ambitious Baron

attributes.content: He... died?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The spectre force did that...?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Don't they band together? Why are the spectre force targeting their own?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Let's get out of here first.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You, hold still.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Who are you? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: My, um... I was just delivering medicine... You all started fighting before I knew it.
attributes.name: Operator Will

attributes.content: Delivering medicine? Who for? Is it the Victorian soldiers?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: I... aheh... Rhodes Island's medicine is for Infected use, and we don't pay mind to patients' identities...
attributes.name: Operator Will

attributes.content: Your movements are suspect.
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: It's alright now, Will.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Outcast—The Lass! You—You came just in time!
attributes.name: Operator Will

attributes.content: Hey, you got the comms this afternoon, didn't you? Rhodes Island's called an emergency stop to all daily business in County Hillock.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I got it, yeah, but...
attributes.name: Operator Will

attributes.content: —You wanted to finish delivering the rest?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: You're a good kid. Pass me the meds, and I'll deliver what's left for you.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Lass, what on Terra's going on outside? There was fighting everywhere in just a blink!
attributes.name: Operator Will

attributes.content: Several hundred years of accumulated resentment put to use, turned into a fire ready to destroy all.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: And let me tell you, it's only just getting started.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Hurry on back. Now that I'm here, my highest priority's making sure we don't lose a single Rhodes Islander.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Alright, Lass... Right, I just caught sight of Miss Jane near District Seventeen... She... She comes to the office so often, we all half-treat her as a Rhodes Island Operator!
attributes.name: Operator Will

attributes.content: She's a Victorian soldier, and with what these rioters think, they won't just let her go!
attributes.name: Operator Will

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I'll amend my previous statement—we're not losing even half a Rhodes Islander.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Leader, I've evacuated everyone I could.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Good. Do you have any injuries?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: None. It's been a little reassurin' in a way, while coming to blows all night. Aside from that head Caster, and a couple strong folk, most of the rest of the soldiers are still normal people.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: They've gotten trainin', but their discipline's not much to speak of. With equal numbers, and an open confrontation, they wouldn't be any match for our team.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're giving it preconditions. Besides, their main opponent is the barracks.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You're right, Leader. If they're going to fight them, the barracks won't be on the front foot.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Any more discoveries?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The weapons they're armed with are all first-grade. Just now when I went rescuin' those few officials and nobles, someone tried to sneak on me at the corner, and after I knocked him out, I brought what he was holdin' back.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: A Victorian standard military crossbow?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It's a model from two years ago, but it's been modified. Look at these two coils and the guide rail underneath.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: A Shield-piercing Rounds Accelerator.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I'm not too smart with crossbows, and I never saw this in the army or at school. Is this our tech?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Doesn't seem too like it.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Bagpipe, have I overlooked something, maybe...? We came to investigate the theft of Originium products, correct?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Yes. The spectre force want to fend against our regular army without a doubt, so they'd need a lot of weapons for sure.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But the crossbow in our hands reveals a lot of information.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Firstly, the enemy has secretly been plotting for longer than we thought; secondly, beyond the goods they've stolen from our possession, there are other powers that have been funding their operations in the long term.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: In other words, in this instance, here, they had no plans to take up new equipment and rush to arms.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Right! So in that sense, where did the weapons we lost most recently go?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: So you've realized where the problem is—the spectre force finally show themselves, but the Originium products that disappeared in County Hillock are still missing.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I hope Triangle's found some new leads.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: (Hushed) Here, Leader.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Is your group still doing alright?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Snare's been lightly injured, the others can still operate. It's just, everyone's tired and hungry. Our situation's not that nice for sure.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Were you involved in combat yesterday, too?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Yes. Since nightfall, large numbers of enemies have suddenly poured out. It's like they were just lying in wait in the greenhouses and irrigation systems all this time—
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: That seems to be exactly where they hid themselves. For the troops not familiar with the agricultural plates, it'll be exceedingly difficult to win that hide-and-seek.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We fought face-to-face with a small wave of them, there were far too many enemies in my view, and we hid away on my lead, all the way until daybreak.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: You've done very well. Can you return to the city?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Haha. That'll be a little tricky, Leader. Half of them have gone into the city, and the other half are still around everywhere.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Leader, our group all agrees, we should continue with our initial task.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: We've discovered a transport vehicle. Your guess was right, someone really did use an agriculture transport route to convey these Originium products somewhere.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Not that much each time. These ones today, most likely, are the last of them.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: These ones today? Where are you?!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We're hidden onboard the transport vehicle right now.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: I can't risk talking too much. Worried they might hear. Next time we make contact, you'll know who the thief was.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: This is too dangerous!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Haha... Leader, you and Bagpipe, be careful too.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Triangle, out.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Bagpipe, inform Cello ASAP, we're returning to the barracks now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: '...Districts Three through Nine have fallen...'
'...The city hall, the newspaper, and Good Mary's Hospital are simultaneously under enemy attack...'
'...Baron Paulet's wife sent an urgent cable—she's lost contact with her husband since early morning—she's requesting the barracks send help...'
Colonel! I have something to say.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Let her in.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: I hope you aren't here to give me nonsense, Skamandros. As you can see, our enemy is savage. I have no time to contest with you again.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Colonel, the enemy is hiding in the agricultural plates.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: That's where they were concealed. On top of that, they're not all in the city—they have even more hands.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I knew it.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: I suggest you send someone fast to evacuate the citizens at the ag plates, and carry out emergency decoupling of the central city and those plates ASAP, to avoid letting even more of the enemy into the city!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I don't need you instructing me on what to do.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Colonel! It may not be in our power to prevail if we solely depend on the stationed troops, and my platoon, to cope with enemy forces infiltrating the city. We have to ensure the enemy gets no further reinforcement—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You can go.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Colonel?!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It's my business how County Hillock is preserved.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: In the principal duty that is upholding the security of the Victorian Empire, we should be united!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hill, show her out.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Did you hear that, Hill? The ag plates, ha! They're hiding in the ag plates! I deduced as much long ago. Who else would open the door for the ghosts?!
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Yes, Colonel. The Tarans are assisting them.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: How are the artillery battalion's preparations?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: According to plan. The final batch of material will arrive at around noon.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: Good. Have them speed up the remodeling. Every time I even think of those disgusting things bounding around in my city, it has me eager to finish this.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Oh, yes, Skamandros and her subordinate. The wolf from Londinium is still biting fast and won't let go. You've heard, haven't you? They have a helping hand outside.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Give the command. Regardless of the means, we cannot let anyone stand in the way of our plans.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Yes, Colonel.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: As for Skamandros, before we're done, she cannot be left to act freely.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: I have realized something... thanks to her talking-to.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Why were our movements last night at Bolton's already known to the enemy?!
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Skamandros... no, it couldn't be. Though she shares that weakness and naivete innate to her kind of nobility, she has a highly secured loyalty to the Empire.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Hmph... it seems rabble is ultimately rabble, their base nature always stiff to bend.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Within these last few hours, one more thing must be done. And it's long overdue.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton
